com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SettingTextChangeListener


  • public interface SettingTextChangeListener
    The S-Canvas based Callback Listener Interface about the Events of Text Setting
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTextAlignmentChanged(int textHorizAlignment)
      This handler is called when the text alignment changes.
      void onTextColorChanged(int textColor)
      This handler is called when the text color is changed
      void onTextFontChanged(java.lang.String fontName)
      This handler is called when the font is changed
      void onTextSizeChanged(int textSize)
      This handler is called when the text size is changed
      void onTextStyleChanged(int textStyle)
      This handler is called when the text style is changed

      • onTextAlignmentChanged

        void onTextAlignmentChanged(int textHorizAlignment)
        This handler is called when the text alignment changes.
        The alignment options are defined by the following values:
        SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_NORMAL, SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_CENTER, SAMMLibConstants.SAMM_ALIGN_OPPOSITE
        Parameters:
        textHorizAlignment - Text horizontal alignment option
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
